name: Pacific Siege: BOM
description:
• STUDENTS - The findings of this study will give students more time on the computer rather than the use of books and handouts. They can also acquire more knowledge through the help of video games.
  • TEACHERS - The results of this study can also help teachers with fewer explanations. In conclusion, teachers can now change their way of teaching, they can cope more with their students.
  • PARENTS – The results of this study can also help the parents understand that not all games are for leisure only, but some are used for educational purposes.
  • FUTURE RESEARCHERS - The discoveries of this study can agree with or disprove the findings of previous research on the same topic; thus, this study can result in different outcomes that can lead to a new theory that can help future researchers as their reference.
